lead_paragraph: Before the game, Buffalo cut the backup running back Karlos Williams and announced that defensive tackle Marcell Dareus was entering a rehabilitation clinic.

headline.print_headline: Bills Put Aside Off-Field Concerns and Shut Down the Listless Giants
headline.main: Bills Put Aside Off-Field Concerns and Shut Down the Giants

snippet: Before the game, Buffalo cut the backup running back Karlos Williams and announced that defensive tackle Marcell Dareus was entering a rehabilitation clinic....
abstract: Buffalo Bills beat New York Giants, 21-0, in exhibition game.
